page.title: 19A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: The new day starts when my mum brings me a cup of tea to my bed.I drink it then go to the bathroom to get dressed.I then go downstairs to have my breakfast.I then go off to school.School starts at 9.00 a.m.At school the first lesson is usually maths.We have a break at 10.30 and dinner at 12.15 until 1.25 and school finishes at 3.25 p.m. When I get home I watch television until my dinner which is at 5.15 p.m. After dinner I go out to play and come back in about 8.00 p.m. Then I have a bath and watch television untill 9.00 p.m.
